external_games.name: Adventures With Oslo: Tools and Gadgets

name: Adventures With Oslo: Tools and Gadgets
summary: Five programs in one! An animated storybook about a llama named Dolly who is constantly requiring rescue by Jimmy who turns into the many shapes of simple machines; An adventure game taking you on a search of Tooltown and the Valley of Machines for clues and a surprise ending; A Coloring Gallery featuring musical markers and a tic-tac-toe game; A very colorful Maze Arcade challenging you to navigate five increasingly complex mazes while scoring your performance; And an Interactive Database which uncovers all six classes of simple machines- the inclined plane, screw, pulley, wheel and axle, lever, and wedge.
